name: IKEA Home Planner File
summary: Learn about .FPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FPF files may be saved locally by selecting "Save As..." from the File menu. They can be saved on IKEA's server by selecting "Save to IKEA."

description: Floor plan created with IKEA's Home Planner, a program for designing kitchens, offices, and bedrooms with IKEA furniture; includes a custom room layout with IKEA furnishings that can be placed anywhere in the room; may be viewed in 3D from multiple angles.
